faqs.question: What is the price of the product?
faqs.answer: Our product is priced at $99 with a special launch discount of 20%. That brings it down to just $79!

faqs.question: What are the product features?
faqs.answer: Our product comes with AI-powered automation, 24/7 customer support, mobile app access, and seamless integration with your existing tools.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required to start.

faqs.question: How do I get started?
faqs.answer: Getting started is super easy! Just visit our website, click Sign Up, and you'll be ready to go in under 5 minutes.

faqs.question: Do you offer customer support?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We have 24/7 customer support via chat, email, and phone. Our team is always here to help you.
